title: 13.1 Other Objects in the Solar System, such as Meteoroids,Asteroids and Comets
question: a floating piece of stone and metal that moves in space / serpihan batu dan logam kecil yang terapung dan bergerak di angkasa

a small body made up of a mixture of ice, gas and frozen dust, it travels around the Sun in its own orbit / jasad kecil yang terdiri daripada campuran ais, gas dan debu beku yang bergerak mengelilingi Matahari mengikut orbitnya sendiri

Molecular friction between air and the it produces heat until it burns, resulting in a streak of light / Geseran molekul antara udara dengan ia menghasilkan haba sehingga terbakar dan terhasil coretan cahaya
The meteors that can reach the Earth / meteor yang dapat sampai ke Bumi
a large metal and rocky body that travels around the Sun in its own orbit / batuan besar dan logam yang beredar mengelilingi Matahari mengikut orbitnya sendiri
Made up of stones and metals such as iron and nickel / Terbina daripada batuan dan logam seperti besi dan nikel
Originates from fragments of asteroids and comets / Berasal daripada serpihan asteroid dan komet
from 10 μm to 1 m / antara 10 μm hingga 1 m
from 1 m to 1 000 km / dari 1 m hingga 1 000 km
form an asteroid belt / membentuk jalur asteroid
also known as small planets / juga disebut sebagai planet kecil
Consists of two main parts, a head and a tail / Terdiri daripada dua bahagian utama, iaitu kepala dan ekor
Comprises gas and water that freeze into ice, dust and rocky particles / Terbina daripada gas dan air yang membeku menjadi ais dan sedikit debu dan batuan
哪些不在 asteroid belt / lingkaran asteroid ?
